name: Black Lilies
description:
A popular pretty girl and a not-so-wimpy nerd got trapped in a building together for a night because of a cruel prank. Hilarity ensues?

So yeah, it's something for the yuri game jam 2017 that my dumb goldfish brain completely forgot about. It's not completed yet but please give it a try (or 3, yeah it actually requires 3 tries)

I may pick this up again when I'm less busy idk. At the moment, there's only 1 CG

Thank you, people. Those who supported me and fellow dev teams. You guys are based.

Credit: 

 +Art, programming, writing, GUI: me aka toki
